Text.Page:
All around you is the result of an unavoidable situation. Orcans attempting to steal supplies caused the airship's crash, and even now trade our crates among themselves.

It is imperative that those crates are recovered. If you would help, collect at least four and bring them here.
There was hope that one particular crate would be among those you foundâ€”one containing artifacts requested by Sersine. Your efforts are appreciated, of course.

The Tainted Gorge waits for these supplies. Somewhat impatiently, truth be told.

Feel no pressure. All anger is directed at Chione, however unjustified.
